page.title: 12An 11 Year Old Girl's Day
page.content: A day in the life of an{eleven year {old}can be very hectic. My favourite school day is{Friday;}I get up at {eight o'clock,}dress and have my breakfast. After breakfast I clean my teeth and get things ready for school. On a Friday morning everybody goes into the{canteen}for{assembly}and{hymn {practice.}One class provides some {readings.}During the morning we watch a program called{"History Around Us". At{twelve o'clock}we have our dinner. I take sandwiches but some children have school dinners. At{1:15 we come back into class and usually do {project work.}This term our project is about the{Norman Invasion. At{three o'clock}we have{games. During summer we play{rounders}and {short tennis}and go{swimming. Three- {thirty}is home time- the end of another day.
